About GEX

23 Mar 2020 - Current information regarding GEX business operations during the COVID-19 emergency click here.

Since 1991, GEX is a single source provider of a complete range of dosimetry products and services for the radiation processing industry. We serve the complete spectrum of gamma, e-beam, and x-ray radiation process applications, such as medical device sterilization, surface decontamination, the curing of inks and coatings, and food irradiation.
list_alt

Total Quality Assurance

We maintain a zero defect goal in the manufacture and distribution of our products.

ISO 9001:2015 compliant Quality System.

What GEX Provides to Our Customers

Regardless of your application, we can provide a solution to fit your specific requirements. Using the steps below, we can assure our customers get the correct dosimetry solution that meets the requirements of industry and international standards.

question_answer

Step 1: Determine requirements

Let GEX help you determine your specific application requirements.

Download Requirements Guide
list

Step 2: Selection

GEX can help you select and compare systems based on your specific requirements.

check_circle

Step 3: Purchase

Ensure that you get what you need, when you need it

launch

Step 4: Install

Understand the important steps when installing a system

timeline

Step 5: Calibration

Develop a calibration method specific to the application needs

perm_data_setting

Step 6: Use & Maintenance

Customer support and training. And understanding how to maintain and what to expect from your system
